thread.section_title: About.com Central America Travel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Costa Rica in December

title: Costa Rica in December
text:
Humidity: 88% 
Costa Rica Events in December: Christmas Holidays: During Christmas Day and the week after December 25, the all of Costa Rica erupts in celebration: fireworks, fruits and festivals. Many Tico children believe in Santa Claus, anticipating the magical arrival of his gifts under their Christmas tree. 
Tips on Traveling to Costa Rica in December: 
Costa Rica takes its holidays seriously! While the Christmas holiday season is an extraordinary time to visit Costa Rica, itâ€™s also an extremely busy time to visit. Prices are higher, and accommodations must be booked far in advance. Many businesses are also closed all week long. 
Compare rates on flights to San Jose , Costa Rica (SJO) and Liberia, Costa Rica (LIR) 
Source: National Weather Services of Costa Rica Related Articles
